posts.post_content: I am looking to purchase the worst of the worst condition T206's for my collection.  Please let me know what you have.

Hi there,
I may be picking up a lot of T206 cards that are real beaters.  I will know in a few days.  All of the cards are creased and have back damage.  Back damage is having paper loss and paper stuck on the back.  I will post scans for you if and when I get them.
Thanks,
Robert
Still on the lookout for VERY rough t206's including HOF'ers and SL'ers.
Still looking for the rough ones!

Why may I ask?
